✸ Easier to select a number from the Address book.
✸ Voice quality improved.

For April Fools' Day we have released a new feature that allows you not only to change your voice during a call but the voice of the person you talk to.

You can of course still inject funny sound effects to the call.

Thanks everyone for supporting Call Voice Changer, we have reached over 1,000,000 users.

We are dedicated to provide you with the funniest app in the world and provide you with the best call experience.

-New effects added
-Free credit gift for limited time for new users
-Ability to correct the phone number
-Ability to change other party voice pitch
-General bug fixes

Thank you for your support and feedback. We are working on more amazing new features so stay tuned.

Thank you for your support and feedback. We are working on more amazing new features so stay tuned.

iOS7 USERS PAY ATTENTION: you need to authorise both push notifications and microphone for the app to work, otherwise it will freeze on startup and the other person may not hear what you say.

If the app is stuck fix it by opening Settings -> Notification center -> Voice Changer and enable it (move it to the Included section and change the Alert style to Banner). Then reopen the app.

If the other person cannot hear you fix it by opening Settings -> Privacy -> Microphone and enable Voice Changer.

iPad support added.

iOS7 USERS PAY ATTENTION: you need to authorise both push notifications and microphone for the app to work, otherwise it will freeze on startup and the other person may not hear what you say.

If the app is stuck fix it by opening Settings -> Notification center -> Voice Changer and enable it (move it to the Included section and change the Alert style to Banner). Then reopen the app.

If the other person cannot hear you fix it by opening Settings -> Privacy -> Microphone and enable Voice Changer.

iPad support added.

- An exciting new demo call option was added so you can experiment with voice changing and effects adding to the call.
